name: CHARGE SHOT (F J A R N S K A G G L)
name_original: CHARGE SHOT (F J A R N S K A G G L)
description:
CHARGE SHOT

Charge up your energy by pressing the key shown on the screen, and shoot the enemies before they reach you! Useful upgrades will randomly spawn, so try to shoot them down.

Developed for Mini Jam 74 : Chaos
Limitation: Inputs are limited to A, X, B, P, 8, and Space

Game by Phuc Tran / @Fjarnskaggl_
Music by void1gaming / void1gaming.itch.io
developers: F J A R N S K A G G L
